DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"pivotgrid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":0,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"showSubTitle":false,"showTitle":false},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select 
	t.ExpenseTypeName, 
    t.[Group] as GroupType, 
	t.[Billable-Non],
    sum(t.ValueWithVat) as ValueWithVat
from (
	select
		case
			when eit.Name IN ('Travel Advance - Cash') then 'GSDJOB0004: TRAVEL ADVANCE-CASH'
			when eit.Name IN ('Travel Advance - Credit Cards') then 'GSDJOB0005: TRAVEL ADVANCE-CREDIT CARDS'
			When eit.Name IN ('Travel Advance - Air') then 'GSDJOB0003: TRAVEL ADVANCE-AIR'
			when eit.Name IN ('Car Rental') then 'TRAVEL-CAR RENTAL'
			when eit.Name IN ('Airfare','Baggage','Seat Upgrade') then 'TRAVEL-COMMERCIAL AIRFARE'
			when eit.Name IN ('Hotel') then 'TRAVEL-HOTEL'
			when eit.Name IN ('Mileage') then 'TRAVEL-MILEGE'
			when eit.Name IN ('Cash Tips - Bellhop/Valet','Cash Tips - Housekeeping','Internet','In-room Movies','Laundry','Other','Printing/Copies','Research Materials','Talent Travel') then 'TRAVEL-OTHER'
			when eit.Name IN ('Gas','Parking','Taxi/Uber/Public Transportation','Tolls') then 'TRAVEL-TAXI/GAS/CAR SERVICE/PARKING'
			when eit.Name IN ('Client Entertainment - Meals') then 'ENTERTAINMENT-MEALS'
			when eit.Name IN ('Client Entertainment - Non-meals','Client Gift') then 'ENTERTAINMENT-NON-MEALS'
			when eit.Name IN ('Internal Meetings - Meals') then 'INTERNAL MEETINGS-MEALS'
			when eit.Name IN ('Internal Meetings - Non-meals') then 'INTERNAL MEETINGS-NON-MEALS'
			when eit.Name IN ('Cell phone minutes') then 'CELL PHONE'
			when eit.Name IN ('Home Internet') then 'DSL/INTERNET SERVICE'
			when eit.Name IN ('Cell phone data') then 'DATA PLAN'
			when eit.Name IN ('Employee Gifts', 'Donation', 'Subscriptions/Dues/Fees','Fonts','Equipment','Conference/Course Registration','Software','Supplies','Award Entry Fees') then 'OTHER PENDING USE TAX'
			when eit.Name IN ('Nonbillable Alcohol') then 'ENTERTAINMENT MEALS'
			when eit.Name IN ('Meals - Breakfast','Meals - Lunch', 'Meals - Dinner','Meals - Other') then 'EMPLOYEE MEALS'
			else 'OTHERS'
		end as [ExpenseTypeName],
		case 
			when eit.[Group] = 0 then ei.ValueWithVat*-1
			else ei.ValueWithVat
		end as ValueWithVat,
		case 
			when eit.[Group] = 1 then 'Request'
			when eit.[Group] = 0 then 'Advanced'
			else 'Reimbursable'
		end as [Group],
		case    
			when ei.Billable = 1 then 'Billable'
			when ei.Billable = 0 then 'Non-Billable'
		end as [Billable-Non]
	from 
		Expense e, 
		ExpenseItem ei, 
		ExpenseItemType eit
	where 
		ei.Expense = e.Oid and
		ei.[Type] = eit.Oid
		--/*[ExpenseFilter]*/ and e.Oid = @ExpenseId/*[/ExpenseFilter]*/
)t
group by t.ExpenseTypeName, t.[Group], [Billable-Non]
order by t.[Group]
","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{}}]
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Configuration:
{
    "height": "100%",
    "rowHeaderLayout": "standard",
    "showRowTotals": true,
    "allowSortingBySummary": true,
    "allowSorting": true,
    "allowFiltering": true,
    "allowExpandAll": true,
    "showBorders": true,
    "fieldPanel": {
        "showColumnFields": true,
        "showDataFields": true,
        "showFilterFields": true,
        "showRowFields": true,
        "allowFieldDragging": true,
        "visible": true
    },
    "wordWrapEnabled": false,
    "dataSource": {
        "fields": [
            {
                "dataField": "GroupType",
                "dataType": "string",
                "area": "row",
                "expanded": true
            },
            {
                "dataField": "ExpenseTypeName",
                "dataType": "string",
                "area": "row",
                "expanded": true
            },
            {
                "dataField": "ExpenseItemDate",
                "dataType": "date",
                "format": "MM/dd/yy",
                "area": "column",
                "expanded": true
            },
            {
                "dataField": "Billable-Non",
                "dataType": "boolean",
                "area": "column",
                "expanded": true
            },
            {
                "dataField": "ValueWithVat",
                "area": "data",
                "dataType": "number",
                "summaryType": "sum",
                "format": "#,###.##"
            }
        ],
        "store": null,
        "retrieveFields": false
    }
}
